message:
Calculate your age in years, days, hours, minutes, seconds in ruby
https://gist.github.com/9185583
#rails #ruby #ROR #coding

data.message:
Nice work but can be better, no need to require time or recreate two time objects in the loop. One is clearly a constant.

dot notation following an 'end' is unreadable and confusing for a beginner. Also "Date_of_birth" should begin with a small letter.
Be liberal with your indentation, you should align patterns, check my fork's array formatting.

Lastly, use descriptive vocabulary when appropriate (Time.new is the same as Time.now)

I forked it: https://gist.github.com/l0gicpath/9187232
yup, there is always a better way to do it ^_^, thanks
